MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Margin="72,0,0,0"> <TextBox Name="TextInput" Margin="5" MaxHeight="40" MinWidth="300"></TextBox> <Button Name="btnTakePhoto" Style="{StaticResource PhotoAppBarButtonStyle}" Click="OnTakePhotoClick" /> <Button Name="ButtonSave" Style="{StaticResource UploadAppBarButtonStyle}" Click="ButtonSave_Click"/> </StackPanel>

<StackPanel Orientation="Vertical"> <CheckBox Name="CheckBoxComplete" IsChecked="{Binding Complete, Mode=TwoWay}" Checked="CheckBoxComplete_Checked" Content="{Binding Text}" Margin="10,5" VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <Image Name="ImageUpload" Source="{Binding ImageUri, Mode=OneWay}" MaxHeight="250"/> </StackPanel>

How to make data model changes to a .NET backend mobile service
